float32.name: minimum distance
float32.description: the distance below which this sound no longer gets louder

float32.name: maximum distance
float32.description: the distance beyond which this sound is no longer audible

float32.name: skip fraction
float32.description: fraction of requests to play this sound that will be ignored (0 means always play.)

float32.name: random pitch bounds
float32.description: the sound's pitch will be randomly selected and will be in this range. (1.0 is the recorded pitch.) min

float32.description: the sound's pitch will be randomly selected and will be in this range. (1.0 is the recorded pitch.) max

degree.name: inner cone angle
degree.description: within the cone defined by this angle and the sound's direction, the sound plays with a gain of 1.0.

degree.name: outer cone angle
degree.description: outside the cone defined by this angle and the sound's direction, the sound plays with a gain of OUTER CONE GAIN. (0 means the sound does not attenuate with direction.)

float32.name: outer cone gain
float32.description: the gain to use when the sound is directed away from the listener

ascii.name: name
